title: REGULAR TICKET
aboutText:
Full access to all talks, workshops, and networking events. 
 What are you waiting for?

title: GROUP TICKET
aboutText: Bring your whole team! Perfect for companies or groups attending together. Discount applies to purchases of 4+ tickets.

title: WORKSHOP TICKET
aboutText: Access to any of the 2-day workshops. Perfect for hands-on learners looking to dive deep into Elixir.
